song.title: Popcorn
song.info:
!!!the father of Popcorn melody was Gershon Kingsley!!!
Prehistory
On January, 1st 2004 I wanted to listen popcorn very much. I haven't found this music among the collection. Therefore I have written Awesome cover.
done in BUZZ 15 january 2004 I like this melody all my life :)... so, - i wrote it! icq: 171286239 (Space and Zodiac - rulez 4ever)
cover by Podolskiy Denis aka Slash_AtD 2nd place at mp3 compo Synthesis demoparty 4 20-22 feb 2004 France!
